description:
Touko wants to bring back the Student Council Stage Show for the first time in seven years at the school’s culture festival. But Yuu and Maki have their reservations.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: L`écart entre l`amour et un simple baiser / Un simple spectateur
Suki to Kiss no Kyori / Yakusha ja Nai
The Distance Between Fondness and Kisses / Not One of the Characters
好きとキスの距離 / 役者じゃない
